DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study confirm clinical efficacy safety P-3073 patient affect isolated psoriatic nail ( ) and/or psoriatic nail concomitant mild moderate plaque psoriasis .
DOC.brief_title: Study Evaluate Efficacy Safety P-3073 Nail Solution Treatment Nails Affected Psoriasis
DOC.criteria: Written inform consent start study related procedure Patients age 18 80 year old race . Males female . Patients mild moderate psoriastic fingernail ( ) define fingernail/s matrix psoriasis NAPSI score and/or bed psoriasis NAPSI score ≥ 1 ≤ 3 baseline . In case skin involvement , patient establish clinical diagnosis mildtomoderate psoriasis ( BSA involvement ≤ 8 % PASI ≤ 10 ) Woman pregnant , nursing infant , plan pregnancy study period . Use systemic treatment psoriasis last six month screen visit . Use photochemotherapy form radiotherapy last four week screen visit . Positive mycology finding Systemic use immunosuppressive , chemotherapy corticosteroid last three month screen visit . Consumption Vitamin D analogue last three month . History hypercalcaemia hypercalciuria . HIV infection immunodeficiency . Alcohol substance abuse . Patients history allergic reaction calcipotriol excipients .
